Name: VR Racing
About the game: VR Racing breaks the traditional notion of playing with a gamepad comtroller to allow you to use your motion controllers to control the car. Whether it be steering or shifting gears, it can all be done with your hands (using motion controllers); no need for an extremely expensive steering wheel just to feel the immersion. VR Racing features an open world map with online freeroam, in which you can show off your car, make new friends, and hangout as you like. Feel the need to do a traditional race? Just the press the button and you'll be paired with online players to race from start to finish. Build a strong ranking as your profile stores your total matches, and wins. Feel the need for some alone time? Practice race against AI, or drive around in Single Player Freeroam. Featuring 6 realistic cars, with a realistic map, you will feel true immersion using your hands to do anything you like inside the cars.
